translations: n.（天主教神职人员用的）四角帽

sentences.sentence: The pistol he used was a 38 calibre Biretta of Italian manufacture; scores of these weapons were captured from the Italians in North Africa and smuggled back to India by Indian soldiers.
sentences.translation: 行凶的手枪是意大利制点38 Biretta手枪；很多这类武器都是在北非战场上从意大利士兵手上缴获，然后被印度士兵偷运回印度的。
